pages.text: Special Effect, abbreviated as SE, is a passive skill possessed by Slash Blades.$()$(br)Different SEs have different effects, and multiple SEs can coexist in one blade.$()$(br)Some SEs can be copied or removed, while others cannot.$()

Using $(item)Proud Soul Crystal$(), you can copy, remove, and add SEs to Slash Blades. For specific methods, refer to the $(l:slashblade_base_knowledge/proudsoul_intro)'Knowledge of Proud Souls'$() section.$()
